sentences.en: British mortgages have customarily been at variable short - term rates, closely tied to the Bank's base rate.
sentences.cn: 英国抵押贷款的利率紧跟银行基础利率变化而变化.

sentences.en: Customarily, he began the day in Tokyo with an intellectual feast.
sentences.cn: 在东京, 他通常以精神会餐来开始自己一天的生活.

sentences.en: Customarily, men have shied away from close relationships in which they confide in others.
sentences.cn: 通常, 男人总是避开那种可以向对方交心的亲密关系.

sentences.en: In addition to the check - in procedures, the room clerks are customarily responsible for recording advance registrations.
sentences.cn: 除了办理住宿手续外, 客房登记员按惯例还负责预约登记.

sentences.en: Marriages in medieval Europe were customarily arranged by the families.
sentences.cn: 在中世纪的欧洲，婚姻通常是由双方的家庭安排的。

sentences.en: The effect is customarily called centrifugal distortion.
sentences.cn: 这种效应通常叫做离心力形变.

sentences.en: These drugs were customarily employed to treat the disease.
sentences.cn: 以前这些药通常用来治这种疾病.

sentences.en: They customarily went into battle side by side with their men.
sentences.cn: 他们向来都同士兵并肩作战.

sentences.en: This is customarily in the center of the map at the top tip of the diamond.
sentences.cn: 这个集合位置通常在地图中间的钻石广场(地图最中间)的顶端.

sentences.en: This transformation is customarily called the Industrial Revolution.
sentences.cn: 习惯上，这种转变被称为“产业革命”。
